metadata.title: Strait of Georgia CTD and Bottle Data by STRATOGEM

creators.name: Rich Pawlowicz of University of British Columbia, Department of Earth

metadata.description: To define the effects of tidal, diurnal, weatherband, seasonal, and climatic influences in the production surface layer of Strait of Georgia.
metadata.notes:
